article_title: What Gov. Sam Brownback gets wrong about rural health care in Kansas
article_text:
Governor said a group will study the problems of Kansas rural health care

Medicaid expansion must be part of the solution

Brownback oversimplifies the challenges

article_metadata.news-keywords: Kansas, Obamacare, rural, hospitals, Sam, Brownback
article_metadata.description: With concerns mounting about access to medical services in rural areas, Gov. Sam Brownback of Kansas has asked for a task force to address the challenges. But by apparently ruling out expansion of Medicaid eligibility, Brownback is asking his solutions group to ignore the most accessible and obvious remedy.
article_metadata.title: What Gov. Sam Brownback gets wrong about rural health care in Kansas | The Kansas City Star
